doc.title: Welcome to the House of Fur Pi
doc.plot: A nasty sorority is the setting for this academic romp which showcases some of the naughtiest extra-curricular activities from these saucy students! Lots of tease, loads of hard-bodied babes and professors who delight in rewarding achievement with more than a passing grade! Sexy sorority sisters in their rush week - and all who are lucky enough to be convinced to participate!
